00021 class QMouseEvent;

00023 namespace Testing {
00024     struct Base {
00025         Base() { cerr << "Base()" << endl; }
00026     };
00027 
00028     struct Derived1: public Base {
00029         Derived1() { cerr << "Derived1()" << endl; }
00030     };
00031 
00032     struct Derived2: public Base {
00033         Derived2() { cerr << "Derived2()" << endl; }
00034     };
00035 
00036     struct Derived3: public Base {
00037         Derived3() { cerr << "Derived3()" << endl; }
00038     };
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042     class MyWidget: public QWidget {
00043         Q_OBJECT
00044         public:
00045 
00046             class ClassMaker {
00047                 public:
00048                     virtual Base* make_base()=0;
00049             };
00050 
00051             template <typename T>
00052                     class TemplatedClassMaker: public ClassMaker {
00053                         public:
00054                             virtual Base* make_base() { return new T; }
00055                     };
00056 
00057             void addBase(Base* b) {  myObject=b; }
00058             void generateMenu();
00059 
00060             Base *myObject;
00061             QMenu *menu;
00062 
00063         protected:
00064             void mousePressEvent (QMouseEvent *);
00065     };
00066 
00067     class SlotHelper: public QObject {
00068         Q_OBJECT
00069         public:
00070             SlotHelper(MyWidget* w, MyWidget::ClassMaker *cm):
00071                 mw(w),class_maker(cm) {}
00072             ~SlotHelper() { delete class_maker;}
00073         public slots:
00074             void slot();
00075         private:
00076             MyWidget* mw;
00077             MyWidget::ClassMaker *class_maker;
00078     };
00079 }
